```{r setup, include = FALSE}
  comment = "#>"

library(dplyr)
library(scmisc)
```

## Installation

You can install the release version of scmisc from [Github](https://github.com/ddiez/scmisc) with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("ddiez/scmisc")
```


# Plots

## Expand columns

```{r}
d <- iris %>% mutate(dim1 = Petal.Length, dim2 = Petal.Width)
plot_coord(d, size = 1)
```

```{r}
plot_coord(d, size = 1, expand = "Species")
```

```{r}
d <- d %>% mutate(class = sample(c("A", "B"), n(), replace = TRUE))
plot_coord(d, expand = c("Species", "class"), size = 1)
```
